languages.text: At the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s third turn, the crew restores 50% of the {g|Encyclopedia:HullIntegritySpace}hull{/g} damage received since the start of combat.

traits.locale_text: At the beginning of the flagship's third turn, the crew restores 50% of the hull damage received since the start of combat.
At the beginning of the flagship's third turn, the crew restores 50% of the hull damage received since the start of combat.

languages.text: В начале 3-го хода флагмана экипаж восстанавливает 50% повреждений корпуса, полученных с начала космического боя.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the flagship's 3rd turn, the crew restores 50% of the hull damage received since the start of the space combat.

languages.text: Au début du troisième tour du vaisseau amiral, l'équipage restaure 50 % des dégâts à la coque subis depuis le début du combat.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the flagship's third turn, the crew restores 50% of the hull damage received since the start of combat.

traits.locale_text: Au début du troisième tour du vaisseau amiral, l'équipage restaure 50 % des dégâts à la coque subis depuis le début du combat.

languages.text: Zu Beginn des dritten Zugs des Flaggschiffs stellt die Besatzung 50 % des Rumpfschadens, der seit Beginn des Kampfes erlitten wurde, wieder her.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the flagship's third turn, the crew restores 50% of the hull damage received since the start of combat.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des dritten Zugs des Flaggschiffs stellt die Besatzung 50 % des Rumpfschadens, der seit Beginn des Kampfes erlitten wurde, wieder her.

languages.text: 旗艦の3度目のターン開始時、戦闘開始以後に受けた船体ダメージの50%を回復する。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the flagship's third turn, the crew restores 50% of the hull damage received since the start of combat.

traits.locale_text: 旗艦の3度目のターン開始時、戦闘開始以後に受けた船体ダメージの50%を回復する。

languages.text: 旗舰的第三回合开始时，船员会自动修复舰船，恢复舰体自战斗开始所承受伤害的50%。
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the flagship's third turn, the crew restores 50% of the hull damage received since the start of combat.

traits.locale_text: 旗舰的第三回合开始时，船员会自动修复舰船，恢复舰体自战斗开始所承受伤害的50%。

languages.text: Al comienzo del tercer turno de la nave insignia, la tripulación recupera el 50 % del daño recibido desde que empezó el combate.
languages.original_text: At the beginning of the flagship's third turn, the crew restores 50% of the hull damage received since the start of combat.

traits.locale_text: Al comienzo del tercer turno de la nave insignia, la tripulación recupera el 50 % del daño recibido desde que empezó el combate.
